Name: *!data
Doc: The data object bound to this chart control.

Name: type
Doc: Chart type. See the Plotly chart type documentation for details.

Name: mode
Doc: Chart mode. See the Plotly chart mode documentation for details.

Name: x
Doc: Column name for the x axis. Synonym for lon.

Name: y
Doc: Column name for the y axis. Synonym for lat.

Name: z
Doc: Column name for the z axis.

Name: lon
Doc: Column name for the longitude value. Synonym for x.

Name: lat
Doc: Column name for the latitude value. Synonym for y.

Name: text
Doc: Column name for the text associated to the point for the indicated trace. This is meaningful only when _mode_ has the text option.

Name: title
Doc: The title of this chart control.

Name: render
Doc: If True, this chart is visible on the page.

Name: on_range_change
Doc:
Callback function called when the visible part of the x axis changes. The function receives four parameters:
  • state (State^): the state instance.
  • id (optional[str]): the identifier of the chart control.
  • action (optional[str]): the name of the action that provoked the change.
  • payload (dict[str, any]): the full details on this callback's invocation, as emitted by plotly.

Name: columns
Doc:
List of column names
  • str: ;-separated list of column names
  • List[str]: list of names
  • dict: {"col_name": {format: "format", index: 1}} if index is specified, it represents the display order of the columns. If not, the list order defines the index

Name: label
Doc:
The label for the indicated trace.
This is used when the mouse hovers over a trace.

Name: name
Doc: The name of the indicated trace.

Name: selected
Doc: List of the selected point indices.

Name: color
Doc: The color of the indicated trace (or a column name for scattered).

Name: selected_color
Doc: The color of the selected points for the indicated trace.

Name: marker
Doc: The type of markers used for the indicated trace. See marker for details. Color and size can be column name.

Name: line
Doc: The configuration of the line used for the indicated trace. See line for details. If the value is a string, it must be a dash type or pattern (see dash style of lines for details).

Name: selected_marker
Doc:
The type of markers used for selected points in the indicated trace.
See <a href="https://plotly.com/javascript/reference/scatter/#scatter-selected-marker">selected marker for details.

Name: layout
Doc: The plotly.js compatible layout object.

Name: plot_config
Doc: The plotly.js compatible configuration options object.

Name: options
Doc: The plotly.js compatible data object where dynamic data will be overridden..

Name: orientation
Doc: The orientation of the indicated trace.

Name: text_anchor
Doc: Position of the text relative to the point. Valid values are: top, bottom, left, and right.

Name: xaxis
Doc: The x axis identifier for the indicated trace.

Name: yaxis
Doc: The y axis identifier for the indicated trace.

Name: width
Doc: The width, in CSS units, of this element.

Name: height
Doc: The height, in CSS units, of this element.
